name: List
title: List
description: A list is a curated collection of resources.

elements.name: List
elements.description: A list is a curated collection of resources.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Identifier for the List assigned for business purposes outside the context of FHIR.

elements.name: status
elements.description: Indicates the current state of this list.

elements.name: mode
elements.description: How this list was prepared - whether it is a working list that is suitable for being maintained on an ongoing basis, or if it represents a snapshot of a list of items from another source, or whether it is a prepared list where items may be marked as added, modified or deleted.

elements.name: title
elements.description: A label for the list assigned by the author.

elements.name: code
elements.description: This code defines the purpose of the list - why it was created.

elements.name: subject
elements.description: The common subject (or patient) of the resources that are in the list if there is one.

elements.name: encounter
elements.description: The encounter that is the context in which this list was created.

elements.name: date
elements.description: The date that the list was prepared.

elements.name: source
elements.description: The entity responsible for deciding what the contents of the list were. This is the same as the author of the list.

elements.name: orderedBy
elements.description: What order applies to the items in the list.

elements.name: note
elements.description: Comments that apply to the overall list.

elements.name: emptyReason
elements.description: If the list is empty, why the list is empty.
